## Source: amazon-inspector (1cdfd9c23b7a8d5b1d531b80431c97eb2b950c10d528d537fdd70ed62659d3d6)
The package karem7 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fc2e767d0dc38af90a1b88381666d2332a206a84b4d73a078ad57de5df3d7088)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karem7' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
